resources.string: Please type in your name to get started:
In order to contact us, please use the following email: [coming soon]
We\'re happy to answer all the questions or comments you may have about the app.
To scan a QR Code, click the button below:
How to dispose of medical waste
The result from the scan will be displayed here

There are many different steps one can take to ensure of the safe disposal of medical waste at home. For one, a medical waste container should be placed at your home. This medical waste box will than collect any item that encounters body fluids and or any solid waste that is being generated in the diagnosis, treatment or immunization of human. If one has any sharps that needs to be disposed of when home, one must have a “sharps container”.
